comments.comment: Hi! thanks for your contribution!, great first issue!

This is clearly a 3rd-party issue, and simply happens because both tensorflow and tensorboard is installed in the same environment, which can lead to some problems when calling the SummaryWriter of pytorch. I could get this working in a new enviroment with only tensorboard installed. Therefore this is not a problem related to lightning directly.
